message.entry: Input matrix must not contain NaN or Inf values.
SVD does not support sparse matrices. Use SVDS to compute a subset of the singular values and vectors of a sparse matrix.
Invalid option combination. Use svd(X,''econ'') or svd(X,0) for economy-size decompositions.
First input must be single or double.
Input must be 2-dimensional. Use PAGESVD to compute the SVD of each page of an N-D array.
Invalid option. Option must be: ''econ'', ''matrix'', or ''vector''.
Invalid option combination. You can specify ''matrix'' or ''vector'', but not both.
Requested array size is too large. Consider using the ''econ'' option.
